title: Do Babies Need to Eat Meat?
author: Andrea Petersen
description: For its first-ever dietary guidelines for children under 2 years old, the USDA weighs recommendations for a diet including fruit, vegetables—and meat, prompting objections from plant-based advocates.
cleaned_text: Oct. 12, 2020 7:00 pm ET A federal committee's recommendations for what babies and toddlers should eat highlight growing concerns about nutrient deficiencies and later obesity. But advice that youngsters eat a significant amount of meat is spurring a backlash from advocates of plant-based diets. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
